title: How to use bbox dataset on yolo
body:
### Search before asking

- [X] I have searched the YOLOv3 [issues](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/issues) and [discussions](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/discussions) and found no similar questions.


### Question

I have a dataset marked with bbox, but yolo uses txt, I have tried many programs to convert it, but all failed. I'm still trying to learn python, so I would like to ask if there is a solution, or if there are related cases that can help
